game.name: Night At The Mall
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Take the night shift in an empty shopping mall. Explore dark corridors, sit in the false safety of the security office, and feel the hours drag on as the building around you grows more unsettling.
